Html:
So far the DB issues seem to be resolved with the latest MDF (thanks!)

However now when I do a Publish of the OxiteSite I get this error:

Publishing folder Skins/Admin/Views/ContentItem...
Unable to add 'Skins/Admin/Views/ContentItem/GlobalContentEdit.ascx' to the Web site.  
Unable to add file 'Skins\Admin\Views\ContentItem\GlobalContentEdit.ascx'.  The system cannot find the file specified.

Unable to add 'Skins/Admin/Views/ContentItem/GlobalContentEdit.aspx' to the Web site.  Unable to add file 'Skins\Admin\Views\ContentItem\GlobalContentEdit.aspx'.  The system cannot find the file specified.

Unable to add 'Skins/Admin/Views/Shared/EditContentItems.ascx' to the Web site.  Unable to add file 'Skins\Admin\Views\Shared\EditContentItems.ascx'.  The system cannot find the file specified

Any ideas here? Should I just skip it? Sorry if this was covered in another post.

Thanks!
Steven

Sorry about that.  I missed a few files in the merge last week between Oxite and MicrosoftPDC branches.  OxiteSite is a copy instead of a branch because there are things that are specific to each site in there so it's a little difficult to keep the views in sync.  Get latest and everything will work fine for you.
